verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلذَّٰرِيَـٰتِ ذَرْوًا

translations.text: By the winds scattering ˹dust˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waththariyati tharwa
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱلْحَـٰمِلَـٰتِ وِقْرًا

translations.text: and ˹the clouds˺ loaded with rain,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falhamilati wiqra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱلْجَـٰرِيَـٰتِ يُسْرًا

translations.text: and ˹the ships˺ gliding with ease,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faljariyati yusra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱلْمُقَسِّمَـٰتِ أَمْرًا

translations.text: and ˹the angels˺ administering affairs by ˹Allah’s˺ command!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falmuqassimati amra
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَصَادِقٌ

translations.text: Indeed, what you are promised is true.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innama tooAAadoona lasadiq
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّ ٱلدِّينَ لَوَٰقِعٌ

translations.text: And the Judgment will certainly come to pass.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna addeena lawaqiAA
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْحُبُكِ

translations.text: ˹And˺ by the heavens in their marvellous design!<sup foot_note=77415>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wassama-i thati alhubuk
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّكُمْ لَفِى قَوْلٍ مُّخْتَلِفٍ

translations.text: Surely you are ˹lost˺ in conflicting views ˹regarding the truth˺.<sup foot_note=77416>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Innakum lafee qawlin mukhtalif
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يُؤْفَكُ عَنْهُ مَنْ أُفِكَ

translations.text: Only those ˹destined to be˺ deluded are turned away from it.<sup foot_note=77417>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yu/faku AAanhu man ofik
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُتِلَ ٱلْخَرَّٰصُونَ

translations.text: Condemned are the liars—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qutila alkharrasoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ فِى غَمْرَةٍ سَاهُونَ

translations.text: those who are ˹steeped˺ in ignorance, totally heedless.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Allatheena hum fee ghamratin sahoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَسْـَٔلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ ٱلدِّينِ

translations.text: They ask ˹mockingly˺, “When is this Day of Judgment?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yas-aloona ayyana yawmu addeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ هُمْ عَلَى ٱلنَّارِ يُفْتَنُونَ

translations.text: ˹It is˺ the Day they will be tormented over the Fire.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma hum AAala annariyuftanoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ذُوقُوا۟ فِتْنَتَكُمْ هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِى كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ

translations.text: ˹They will be told,˺ “Taste your torment! This is what you sought to hasten.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thooqoo fitnatakum hatha allatheekuntum bihi tastaAAjiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ

translations.text: Indeed, the righteous will be amid Gardens and springs,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna almuttaqeena fee jannatinwaAAuyoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ءَاخِذِينَ مَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَبْلَ ذَٰلِكَ مُحْسِنِينَ

translations.text: ˹joyfully˺ receiving what their Lord will grant them. Before this ˹reward˺ they were truly good-doers ˹in the world˺:
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Akhitheena ma atahumrabbuhum innahum kanoo qabla thalika muhsineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَانُوا۟ قَلِيلًا مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ مَا يَهْجَعُونَ

translations.text: they used to sleep only little in the night,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kanoo qaleelan mina allayli mayahjaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَبِٱلْأَسْحَارِ هُمْ يَسْتَغْفِرُونَ

translation.text: And in the hours before dawn

translations.text: and pray for forgiveness before dawn.<sup foot_note=77418>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wabil-ashari humyastaghfiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَفِىٓ أَمْوَٰلِهِمْ حَقٌّ لِّلسَّآئِلِ وَٱلْمَحْرُومِ

translations.text: And in their wealth there was a rightful share ˹fulfilled˺ for the beggar and the poor.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wafee amwalihim haqqun lissa-iliwalmahroom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَفِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ءَايَـٰتٌ لِّلْمُوقِنِينَ

translations.text: There are ˹countless˺ signs on earth for those with sure faith,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wafee al-ardi ayatunlilmooqineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَفِىٓ أَنفُسِكُمْ ۚ أَفَلَا تُبْصِرُونَ

translations.text: as there are within yourselves. Can you not see?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wafee anfusikum afala tubsiroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَفِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ رِزْقُكُمْ وَمَا تُوعَدُونَ

translations.text: In heaven is your sustenance and whatever you are promised.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wafee assama-i rizqukum wamatooAAadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَوَرَبِّ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقٌّ مِّثْلَ مَآ أَنَّكُمْ تَنطِقُونَ

translations.text: Then by the Lord of heaven and earth! ˹All˺ this is certainly as true as ˹the fact that˺ you can speak!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fawarabbi assama-i wal-ardiinnahu lahaqqun mithla ma annakum tantiqoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: هَلْ أَتَىٰكَ حَدِيثُ ضَيْفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ٱلْمُكْرَمِينَ

translations.text: Has the story of Abraham’s honoured guests reached you ˹O Prophet˺?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Hal ataka hadeethu dayfiibraheema almukrameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا ۖ قَالَ سَلَـٰمٌ قَوْمٌ مُّنكَرُونَ

translations.text: ˹Remember˺ when they entered his presence and greeted ˹him with˺, “Peace!” He replied, “Peace ˹be upon you˺!” ˹Then he said to himself,˺ “These people must be strangers!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith dakhaloo AAalayhi faqaloosalaman qala salamun qawmun munkaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهْلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجْلٍ سَمِينٍ

translations.text: Then he slipped off to his family and brought a fat ˹roasted˺ calf,<sup foot_note=77419>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faragha ila ahlihi fajaabiAAijlin sameen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَقَرَّبَهُۥٓ إِلَيْهِمْ قَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ

translations.text: and placed it before them, asking, “Will you not eat?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faqarrabahu ilayhim qala alata/kuloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةً ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَـٰمٍ عَلِيمٍ

translation.text: and they gave him glad tidings

translations.text: ˹They did not eat,˺ so he grew fearful of them.<sup foot_note=77420>1</sup> They reassured ˹him˺, “Do not be afraid,” and gave him good news of a knowledgeable son.<sup foot_note=77421>2</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faawjasa minhum kheefatan qaloo latakhaf wabashsharoohu bighulamin AAaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَقْبَلَتِ ٱمْرَأَتُهُۥ فِى صَرَّةٍ فَصَكَّتْ وَجْهَهَا وَقَالَتْ عَجُوزٌ عَقِيمٌ

translations.text: Then his wife came forward with a cry, clasping her forehead ˹in astonishment˺, exclaiming, “˹A baby from˺ a barren, old woman!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faaqbalati imraatuhu fee sarratin fasakkatwajhaha waqalat AAajoozun AAaqeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوا۟ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ

translations.text: They replied, “Such has your Lord decreed. He is truly the All-Wise, All-Knowing.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo kathaliki qalarabbuki innahu huwa alhakeemu alAAaleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ

translations.text: ˹Later,˺ Abraham asked, “What is your mission, O  messenger-angels?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala fama khatbukumayyuha almursaloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ

translations.text: They replied, “We have actually been sent to a wicked people,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qaloo inna orsilna ilaqawmin mujrimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لِنُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن طِينٍ

translations.text: to send upon them stones of ˹baked˺ clay,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Linursila AAalayhim hijaratanmin teen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِندَ رَبِّكَ لِلْمُسْرِفِينَ

translations.text: marked by your Lord for the transgressors.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Musawwamatan AAinda rabbika lilmusrifeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَخْرَجْنَا مَن كَانَ فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: Then ˹before the torment˺ We evacuated the believers from the city.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faakhrajna man kana feehamina almu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَا وَجَدْنَا فِيهَا غَيْرَ بَيْتٍ مِّنَ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ

translations.text: But We only found one family that had submitted ˹to Allah˺.<sup foot_note=77422>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fama wajadna feehaghayra baytin mina almuslimeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَتَرَكْنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةً لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلْعَذَابَ ٱلْأَلِيمَ

translations.text: And We have left a sign there<sup foot_note=77423>1</sup> ˹as a lesson˺ for those who fear the painful punishment.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Watarakna feeha ayatanlillatheena yakhafoona alAAathaba al-aleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَفِى مُوسَىٰٓ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ بِسُلْطَـٰنٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.text: And in ˹the story of˺ Moses ˹was another lesson,˺ when We sent him to Pharaoh with compelling proof,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wafee moosa ith arsanahuila firAAawna bisultanin mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكْنِهِۦ وَقَالَ سَـٰحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ

translations.text: but Pharaoh was carried away by his power, saying ˹of Moses˺, “A magician or a madman!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fatawalla biruknihi waqala sahirunaw majnoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَخَذْنَـٰهُ وَجُنُودَهُۥ فَنَبَذْنَـٰهُمْ فِى ٱلْيَمِّ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ

translations.text: So We seized him and his soldiers, casting them into the sea while he was blameworthy.<sup foot_note=77424>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faakhathnahu wajunoodahufanabathnahum fee alyammi wahuwa muleem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَفِى عَادٍ إِذْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمُ ٱلرِّيحَ ٱلْعَقِيمَ

translations.text: And in ˹the story of˺ ’Âd ˹was another lesson,˺ when We sent against them the devastating wind.<sup foot_note=77425>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wafee AAadin ith arsalnaAAalayhimu arreeha alAAaqeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَا تَذَرُ مِن شَىْءٍ أَتَتْ عَلَيْهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتْهُ كَٱلرَّمِيمِ

translations.text: There was nothing it came upon that it did not reduce to ashes.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma tatharu min shay-in atatAAalayhi illa jaAAalat-hu karrameem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَفِى ثَمُودَ إِذْ قِيلَ لَهُمْ تَمَتَّعُوا۟ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ

translations.text: And in ˹the story of˺ Thamûd ˹was another lesson,˺ when they were told, “Enjoy yourselves ˹only˺ for a ˹short˺ while.”<sup foot_note=77426>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wafee thamooda ith qeela lahumtamattaAAoo hatta heen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَعَتَوْا۟ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ

translations.text: Still they persisted in defying the commands of their Lord, so they were overtaken by a ˹mighty˺ blast while they were looking on.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: FaAAataw AAan amri rabbihim faakhathat-humuassaAAiqatu wahum yanthuroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَمَا ٱسْتَطَـٰعُوا۟ مِن قِيَامٍ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُنتَصِرِينَ

translations.text: Then they were not able to rise up, nor were they helped.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fama istataAAoo min qiyaminwama kanoo muntasireen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَوْمَ نُوحٍ مِّن قَبْلُ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ قَوْمًا فَـٰسِقِينَ

translations.text: And the people of Noah ˹had also been destroyed˺ earlier. They were truly a rebellious people.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqawma noohin min qablu innahum kanooqawman fasiqeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلسَّمَآءَ بَنَيْنَـٰهَا بِأَيْي۟دٍ وَإِنَّا لَمُوسِعُونَ

translations.text: We built the universe with ˹great˺ might, and We are certainly expanding ˹it˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wassamaa banaynahabi-aydin wa-inna lamoosiAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلْأَرْضَ فَرَشْنَـٰهَا فَنِعْمَ ٱلْمَـٰهِدُونَ

translations.text: As for the earth, We spread it out. How superbly did We smooth it out!<sup foot_note=77427>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wal-arda farashnahafaniAAma almahidoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ خَلَقْنَا زَوْجَيْنِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَذَكَّرُونَ

translations.text: And We created pairs of all things<sup foot_note=77428>1</sup> so perhaps you would be mindful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wamin kulli shay-in khalaqna zawjaynilaAAallakum tathakkaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَفِرُّوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.text: So ˹proclaim, O  Prophet˺: “Flee to Allah! I am truly sent by Him with a clear warning to you.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fafirroo ila Allahi inneelakum minhu natheerun mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَا تَجْعَلُوا۟ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۖ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

translations.text: And do not set up another god with Allah. I am truly sent by Him with a clear warning to you.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala tajAAaloo maAAa Allahi ilahanakhara innee lakum minhu natheerun mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُوا۟ سَاحِرٌ أَوْ مَجْنُونٌ

translations.text: Similarly, no messenger came to those before them without being told: “A magician or a madman!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kathalika ma ata allatheenamin qablihim min rasoolin illa qaloo sahirunaw majnoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِهِۦ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ طَاغُونَ

translation.text: Have they transmitted it to them
Have they transmitted it to them

translations.text: Have they passed this ˹cliché˺ down to one another? In fact, they have ˹all˺ been a transgressing people.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Atawasaw bihi bal hum qawmun taghoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِمَلُومٍ

translations.text: So ˹now˺ turn away from them ˹O Prophet˺, for you will not be blamed.<sup foot_note=77429>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fatawalla AAanhum fama anta bimaloom
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَذَكِّرْ فَإِنَّ ٱلذِّكْرَىٰ تَنفَعُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ

translations.text: But ˹continue to˺ remind. For certainly reminders benefit the believers.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wathakkir fa-inna aththikratanfaAAu almu/mineen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ ٱلْجِنَّ وَٱلْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ

translations.text: I did not create jinn and humans except to worship Me.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama khalaqtu aljinna wal-insailla liyaAAbudoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنْهُم مِّن رِّزْقٍ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطْعِمُونِ

translations.text: I seek no provision from them, nor do I need them to feed Me.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma oreedu minhum min rizqin wamaoreedu an yutAAimoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلْقُوَّةِ ٱلْمَتِينُ

translations.text: Indeed, Allah ˹alone˺ is the Supreme Provider—Lord of all Power, Ever Mighty.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna Allaha huwa arrazzaquthoo alquwwati almateen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ذَنُوبًا مِّثْلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصْحَـٰبِهِمْ فَلَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونِ

translation.text: so let them not ask Me to hasten
so let them not ask Me to hasten

translations.text: The wrongdoers will certainly have a share ˹of the torment˺ like that of their predecessors. So do not let them ask Me to hasten ˹it˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa-inna lillatheena thalamoothanooban mithla thanoobi as-habihimfala yastaAAjiloon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن يَوْمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِى يُوعَدُونَ

translations.text: Woe then to the disbelievers when they face their Day which they are warned of!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fawaylun lillatheena kafaroo minyawmihimu allathee yooAAadoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
